name: Blockman Go
summary:
Blockman GO is a game that combines elements of real battle with graphics highly reminiscent of Minecraft. In addition, this title has a large number of settings and games that you can experience new adventures in each round.

When entering one of the games, most of the time it will be necessary to move your character using the directional buttons. You will also have to quickly search for tools and weapons to interact and defend against other players.

Blockman GO has a chat system to maintain any type of conversation with the other players in your round. And the levels are decorated according to the genre of the chosen game.

Blockman GO is a fun game through which you can engage in fun clashes in one of the many little games that the app includes. Enter each of the worlds and fight to be the last survivor.
